response.original_title: Epica - Live at the Exit Festival 2023 (Live in Serbia)
response.overview: Live at Gorki Main Stage, Petroivaradin, Novi Sad, Serbia, July 7th, 2023 - Setlist : 01. Alpha, 02. Abyss Of Time, 03. The Essence Of Silence, 04. Victims Of Contingency, 05. Unleashed, 06. Martyr Of The Free World, 07. The Final Lullaby, 08. Unchain Utopia, 09. The Obsessive Devotion, 10. The Skeleton Key 11. Code Of Life, 12. Cry For The Moon, 13. Beyond The Matrix, 14. Consign To Oblivion
response.title: Epica - Live at the Exit Festival 2023 (Live in Serbia)
